class population_modeling.bacteria.Bacteria(genome: population_modeling.genome.Genome, properties: population_modeling.bacteria.BacteriaProperties = <factory>)¶

Represents bacteria with its parameters

_status: BacteriaProperties

Bacteria status about age and life: die or alive

genomeGenome

Genome of bacteria

die() → None¶

Changes live status to false

None

inc_age() → None¶

Increase age counter of bacteria When the age exceeds the max_life_time from the genome, the bacteria automatically dies

None

is_alive() → bool¶

True if bacteria is alive, else - False

bool

Bacteria status

class population_modeling.bacteria.BacteriaProperties¶

A class containing properties of a bacterium that are not inherited by its children.

is_alivebool

Is bacteria alive or dead

ageint

Current age of bacteria

Returns status of life status: alive or die

inc_age(self) -> None

Increment age counter

Returns age

Kill the bacteria

class population_modeling.population.Population(genealogical_tree: igraph.Graph)¶

A class containing information about the population. An iterator is implemented using a class Population.Iterator. Bacteria can get information about their population to adjust their behavior

genealogical_tree: igraph.Graph

Structure of the population

class population_modeling.selector.selector.AbstractSelector¶

Simulate evolution processes. Decide what parameters should have child.

external_factors: ExternalFactors

external factors affecting the life of bacteria

have_to_die_funс:

implementation of have to die logic

have_to_reproduct_func:

implementation of have to reproduce logic

__probability_parameter(parent_parameter: float) -> float

Generate probability parameter based on parent’s probability

__choose_child_parameters(parent_parameters: BacteriaParameters) -> BacteriaParameters

Create all child’s parameters based on parent’s probability

have_to_die(p: BacteriaParameters) -> bool

Decide should bacteria die or not

have_to_reproduct(p: BacteriaParameters) -> bool

Decide should bacteria reproduct or not

Return all child’s parameters

class population_modeling.selector.selector.DefaultSelector(params: population_modeling.selector.selector_params.SelectorParams, ext_factors: population_modeling.selector.selector.ExternalFactors)¶

class population_modeling.selector.selector.ExternalFactors(antagonism: float = 0, overpopulation: float = 0)¶

A class of population parameters that allows you to learn about the state of the population.

With the help of this class of bacteria are able to control their size and composition. Play the role of external factors of evolution.

antagonismfloat

External factor which increases death probability

overpopulationfloat

Degree of overcrowding. Influence on reproduction probability.

class population_modeling.selector.selector_params.SelectorParams(loc: float, scale: float)¶

Dataclass for such mutational parameters as mean(loc) and standard deviation(scale).

loc: float

Mean

scale: float

Standard deviation

class population_modeling.mutations.abstract_mutator.AbstractMutator¶

Base class for different mutational processes. Include variation of maximum lifetime, death probability and reproduction probability for the child. Spontaneous mutation happens directly with the individual.

mutation(self) -> None

Realize random mutation of the genome’s parameters

child_max_n(self) -> int

Realize mutation of maximum lifetime

child_p_for_death(self) -> float

Realize mutation of death probability

child_p_for_reproduction(self) -> float

Realize mutation of reproduction probability

child_genome(parent_genome: population_modeling.genome.Genome) → population_modeling.genome.Genome¶

Creates a descendant genome based on the parent genome

Genome

Child’s genome

class population_modeling.mutations.normal_mutator.NormalMutator(mutational_params: population_modeling.mutations.variation_parameters.MutationParams = MutationParams(loc=0, scale=0.01), max_n_params: population_modeling.mutations.variation_parameters.MutationParams = MutationParams(loc=0, scale=3), child_params: population_modeling.mutations.variation_parameters.MutationParams = MutationParams(loc=0, scale=0.05))¶

max_n_params: MutationParams
